alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Meade; Pennington; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 9:32PM MDT until July 29 at 10:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Haakon County in west central South Dakota... Southwestern Ziebach County in west central South Dakota... Eastern Meade County in west central South Dakota... Northeastern Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 1030 PM MDT. * At 932 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles east of Red Owl, or 30 miles southwest of Faith, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Union Center, Plainview, Enning, Elm Springs, Stoneville, Opal, Fairpoint, Creighton, Marcus, Bridger, Howes, White Owl, Billsburg and Red Owl. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota near Mile Marker 102. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
